verses.roman:
ṛtur varcā bharadvājaḥ
parjanyaḥ senajit tathā
viśva airāvataś caiva
tapasyākhyaṁ nayanty amī

synonyms: ṛtuḥ varcā bharadvājaḥ—Ṛtu, Varcā and Bharadvāja; parjanyaḥ senajit—Parjanya and Senajit; tathā—also; viśvaḥ airāvataḥ—Viśva and Airāvata; ca eva—also; tapasya-ākhyam—the month known as Tapasya (Phālguna); nayanti—rule; amī—these.
translation: Ṛtu as the Yakṣa, Varcā as the Rākṣasa, Bharadvāja as the sage, Parjanya as the sun-god, Senajit as the Apsarā, Viśva as the Gandharva and Airāvata as the Nāga rule the month known as Tapasya.
